Package hjb.msg.valuecopiers.streammessage Description

Provides the classes used to allow values read and written from the fields of JMS StreamMessages.

StreamMessageValueCopier extends BaseEncodedValueCopier and serves as base class for the EncodedValueCopiers in this package. There are implementations to support reading and writing of boolean, char, byte, short, int, long, double, float, byte array and string property values to/from a StreamMessage

OrderedStreamMessageValueCopier combines all the other implementations and should be used when the type to be read/written is unknown.
